title: Trump says Putin 'may' attend FIFA
shortDescription: President Donald Trump suggested Vladimir Putin "may" come to the 2026 FIFA World Cup, despite Russia being banned after the 2022 Ukraine invasion.

title: Trump plans to target Chicago next
shortDescription: After deploying troops to DC, President Donald Trump says Chicago is next—even as crime there is already down.

title: Trump admin pauses foreign truck driver visas after deadly crash
shortDescription: The move is the latest in a series by the White House to clamp down on foreign truckers.

title: Trump on Epstein file release: 'Innocent people shouldn't be hurt.'
shortDescription: "Innocent people shouldn’t be hurt but I’m in support of keeping it totally open, I couldn’t care less," Trump said during a White House event Aug 22.

title: Trump says Vladimir Putin 'may' attend 2026 World Cup
shortDescription: Despite Russia being banned from FIFA competitions, Trump said he thinks Putin will attend the 2026 World Cup.

title: Trump: 'I look extremely good in shorts'
shortDescription: The president joked about participating in the FIFA World Cup draw when it comes to the Kennedy Center in December.

title: Chicago is 'next' for federal takeover of police force, says Trump
shortDescription: Trump has already deployed 800 National Guard troops in Washington DC, declaring a public safety emergency. He is setting his sights now on Chicago.

title: Trump DC facelift will extend to Kennedy Center, Lincoln bathroom
shortDescription: The former real estate developer in the White House has moved in his second term to put his stamp not just on policy, but on the physical landscape.

title: Newsom signs ‘Election Rigging Response Act’ in retaliation to Texas
shortDescription: California passes bills to let voters redraw U.S. House maps in 2026, countering Texas’ planned redistricting to boost GOP seats. (Scripps News)

title: Texas lawmakers near final redistricting vote to gerrymander the state
shortDescription: The Texas Senate expected to vote Friday to send the GOP majority's gerrymander to the governor's desk for approval.

title: Trump calls former national security adviser John Bolton a 'lowlife'
shortDescription: President Donald Trump called his former national security adviser John Bolton a 'lowlife' but said he didn't know about the FBI search of his home.

title: Trump calls on Fed Governor Cook to resign over mortgage allegations
shortDescription: President Donald Trump called on Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook to resign following allegations about mortgages she holds in Michigan and Georgia.

title: FBI raids former Trump adviser John Bolton’s home in classified documents probe
shortDescription: FBI agents raided ex–Trump adviser John Bolton’s home over an alleged classified documents probe tied to theft, misuse and retention concerns.

title: FBI searches home of John Bolton, a prominent Trump critic
shortDescription: The FBI was searching the home of former national security adviser John Bolton, who has become a critic of President Trump, according to news reports.

title: Trump visits troops, police in DC
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said troops were "going to stay here awhile" when he visited law enforcement officials in the capital.
